age.Description: Age of the participant at time of testing

NAART.Description: North American Adult Reading Test score, scored similar to an IQ test on a 100-point-based scale

disease_duration.Description: How long since the patient was diagnosed

rl_deficits.Description: Which side of the body has deficits and how great these deficits are

notes.Description: Experimenter/curator notes on collection and curation
